description:
`FormGroup` wraps controls such as `Checkbox` and `Switch`.
It provides compact row layout.
For the `Radio`, you should be using the `RadioGroup` component instead of this one.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propRow: Display group of elements in a compact row.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesRow: Styles applied to the root element if `row={true}`.
